Package com.jackbe.presto.connect

Interface Summary
Connection A Presto Connect interface to the Mashup Server.
 

Class Summary
BaseConnection The base class for Presto Connect connections with common methods implemented from the Connection interface.
ConnectionFactory Factory class to create either local or remote connections to the Mashup Server.
ConnectionTest A sample for Presto Connect for Java.
JUMPRequest An object for request data to send to the Mashup Server.
JUMPResponse The Java object to hold deserialize response data from the Mashup Server.
LocalConnection A connection to invoke services on the Mashup Server in the same JVM as the client application.
RemoteConnection Invokes requests on remote Mashup Servers.
